Reviews.Title: Happy Happy Joy Joy
Reviews.Author: Crystal
Reviews.Content: Great beginner camera!  reat price for the kit! I have replaced the backpack, but it was perfect for a start.Nikon D3200 is my first DSLR camera, and let me say... I have enjoyed it!

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 12 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Nikon D3200 Digital SLR Camera & 18-55mm G VR DX AF-S Zoom Lens (Red) + <2> Nikon 55-200mm VR DX AF-S Lens + <3> Transcend 32GB Class10 SD Card +
<4> PD DSLR Sling Backpack + <5> Zeikos 52mm Hard Lens Hood + <6> Vivitar 52mm UV Glass Filter +
<7> Additional Vivitar 52mm UV Glass Filter + <8> ML-L3 Shutter Remote Control + <9> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit +
<10> PD Spudz Microfiber Cloth + <11> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <12> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D3200 Digital SLR Camera & 18-55mm G VR DX AF-S Zoom Lens (Red) with 55-200mm VR Lens + 32GB Card + Backpack + Filters + Remote + Accessory Kit
